text: Purple Mountain Observatory is an observatory. It uses telescopes to look at stars and new objects in space. It is on Purple Mountain in Nanjing, China. ==Asteroids== Many asteroids were found at the observatory. Among the asteroids found are the Trojan asteroids 2223 Sarpedon, 2260 Neoptolemus, 2363 Cebriones, 2456 Palamedes, and 3494 Purple Mountain.
